title: Token Distribution Problems
description: A quick win: understand Token Distribution Problems.

hook.text: How tokens are distributed at launch determines who controls the DAO. Get it wrong and decentralization is a myth.

buildup.text: Many DAOs give large allocations to founders, investors, and early team members before the public ever participates.

discovery.text: Airdrops tried to fix this â€” distributing tokens to early users for free. But airdrop farmers gamed the system.

twist.text: Fair launches â€” where everyone starts equal â€” sound great but often lack the funding to build the actual product.

climax.text: There's no perfect token distribution model. Every approach creates insiders, outsiders, and inevitable complaints.

punchline.text: Distributing power fairly is the oldest problem in governance. Tokens didn't solve it.

quiz.question: Why is token distribution important for DAOs?
options: It determines who holds governance power and controls decisions
